import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SharedServiceService } from '../service/shared-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { public searchTerm: string = ''; constructor(private cartService : SharedServiceService) {} search(event: any) { this.searchTerm = (event.target as HTMLInputElement).value; console.log(this.searchTerm) this.cartService.search.next(this.searchTerm) } } <<<<<<< HEAD
